summary: Just bringing towelie into Skyrim. hehe
descriptionHtml:
A retexture for the Halo's Poser object poses towel.
[color=#00ff00][b][u]

Requirements
[/u][/b][/color][url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/]Halo's Poser [/url]

[color=#00ff00][u][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/u][/color]
Install with a mod manager.
OR
Copy-paste or drag and drop the files into the data folder.


[color=#00ff00][u][b]UNINSTALLING[/b][/u][/color]
Do I really need to say?
Ok, fine...Â  remove the files.


[u]
Credits

author: Yngol
